a.span: How to Talk to Your Child about Coronavirus

span.h3: Gov. Roy Cooper has closed all public schools until May 15 due to the COVID-19 pandemic. Plans for remote learning during this time and other details related to schools will be released in the coming days.
span.p: Thank you for your patience and understanding. The COVID-19 pandemic is unlike any event we have ever seen, forcing all of us to make countless decisions that have no precedent.
We will share information as it becomes available. Updates will be emailed to all parents. If you are not getting school or district emails, please contact your child's school.
